typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1980 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating)),
		AverageComedyRottonTomato = avg(toInteger({Rotton Tomato}))) ~> AggregateComedyRating
MoviesDB sort(asc(year, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortbyYear
AggregateComedyRating sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MoviesDBComedyRatings.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink
SortbyYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MoviesDBsortedbyYear'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink2
